1.0.name: wordpress/shardul-pandey-talks
1.0.description: The plugin activates a Dashboard Widgets that shows up latest interviews from Shardul Pandey Talks. Shardul Pandey Talks (http://sangkrit.net/talks) is international program for promoting those individuals, who register their domain to create virtual wealth in webspace so if you too want to get interviewed, simply email to shardulpandey@sangkrit.org considering any conversation upon this as subject to publication.
